tasks.task: Explain the process of how vaccines work.
subtasks: Describe the role of viruses in human diseases.
Explain the function of phagocytes in the immune system.
Describe the role of B cells in producing antibodies.
Explain how antibodies prevent viruses from attaching to cells.
Describe the concept of immunity and memory B cells.
Explain the purpose of vaccines in teaching the body to make antibodies.
Describe the process of creating vaccines, including removing harmful genetic material.
Explain the role of ferrets in testing vaccines specifically for flu-like viruses.
Mention the use of laboratory mice in vaccine research.
Discuss the use of chickens in growing viruses for study.
Emphasize the importance of animal studies in vaccine development for coronavirus and other conditions.
